sql-descriptor.sql: UPDATE CATBHOSP SET HOSP_HOSE_CODE = #hosp_hose_code# ,HOSP_INJT_GUBN = #hosp_injt_gubn# ,HOSP_UJIK_CODE = #hosp_ujik_code# ,HOSP_SHAP_CODE = #hosp_shap_code# ,HOSP_SHAP_GRP2 = #hosp_shap_grp2# ,HOSP_IN00_CODE = #hosp_in00_code# ,HOSP_PROD_CODE = #hosp_prod_code# ,HOSP_WASH_CODE = #hosp_wash_code# ,HOSP_IN00_MIN0 = #hosp_in00_min0# ,HOSP_IN00_MAX0 = #hosp_in00_max0# ,HOSP_OUT0_MIN0 = #hosp_out0_min0# ,HOSP_OUT0_MAX0 = #hosp_out0_max0# ,HOSP_NET0_MIN0 = #hosp_net0_min0# ,HOSP_NET0_MAX0 = #hosp_net0_max0# ,HOSP_MGM0_MIN0 = #hosp_mgm0_min0# ,HOSP_MGM0_MAX0 = #hosp_mgm0_max0# ,HOSP_PROC_NAME = #hosp_proc_name# ,HOSP_NET0_CYTM = #hosp_net0_cytm# ,HOSP_NET0_COEF1 = #hosp_net0_coef1# ,HOSP_NET0_COEF2 = #hosp_net0_coef2# ,HOSP_CAVT = #hosp_cavt# ,HOSP_PREP_HOUR = #hosp_prep_hour# ,HOSP_PRSN_CNT0 = #hosp_prsn_cnt0# ,HOSP_MCHH_CODE = #hosp_mchh_code# ,HOSP_MCH2_CODE = #hosp_mch2_code# ,HOSP_MCH3_CODE = #hosp_mch3_code# ,HOSP_MADD_CODE = #hosp_madd_code# ,HOSP_APPL_GUBN = #hosp_appl_gubn# ,HOSP_REMK = #hosp_remk# ,HOSP_UPDT_CMAN = #hosp_updt_cman# ,HOSP_UPDT_DATE = #hosp_updt_date# WHERE HOSP_CORP_CODE = #hosp_corp_code# AND HOSP_STND_GUBN = #hosp_stnd_gubn# AND HOSP_STND_DEGR = #hosp_stnd_degr# AND HOSP_PROC_SEQ0 = #hosp_proc_seq0# AND HOSP_PROC_GUBN = #hosp_proc_gubn#
